manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Party Games Open party games for kids. Interesting STEM toys, let children play and grow together happily!

educational toys for 3 4 5 year old boys About BigShu BigShu is a toy manufacturer,design and produce qualified toys for children of many developmental stages. BigShu toys are in accordance with international safety standards,is a place to find creative alternatives to the Montessori toys and STEM toys you love.Join us. Let's be creative. Shape/Color Recognition Interpersonal Skills Hand-eye Coordination Logical & Spatial Thinking Compatible Unlimited Possibilities

Made with premium materials which is superior ABS plastics, no odor, do not worry about children gnawing while playing. Circular arc angle design, multi-channel safety inspection, each piece is very safe, protect children' little hands are not injured. Seven different colors of magnetic blocks, and has a high transparency, through the light can be projected with color patterns, it will be more beautiful than you imagine.

Magnetic Toys Perfect entertaining toys for single or multiple parties. Enjoy the joy of this 3D magnetic building tiles set with your family. Kids can DIY their own structures and earn the sense of achievement or play the magnetic tiles with family and enjoy the happiness together. This magnetic learning toys can be played at home, in kindergarten, day care center, preschool, etc. Spend the quality time with your family and set time away from electronic devices. STEM Educational Toys Magnetic tiles for kids as a STEM toys help children acquire knowledge of geometry, color & shape recognition, design skills and 3D spatial reasoning at early age. It is never too early to start developing foundational knowledge in STEM and related skills. Learning while playing with this magnetic building blocks will make the learning process a lot more fun. Safe & Durable and Strong Magnets The magnet toys are made of non-toxic ABS plastic material which is safe and durable, the large strong magnets are solid enough to support heavy and tall construction without collapse.You can rest assured that your kids are only playing with the best and safest toddler toys on the market. Learning Gift Magnetic tiles toys is a great birthday gift, Christmas gift or any other occasions’ gift toys for 3 4 5 6 7 8 year old boys and girls. Kids will love to play with this magnet toy set themselves or with peers. Bring joy and fun to your kids and let them learning while playing with fantastic magnetic tiles blocks for kids.
